though no its not you have hands my sister has twins and will sit on the couch kinda frog style with babe on each knee using both hands to feed the babies its might be convenient but not necessary both twins do necessarily eat at the same time in fact when ve seen friends and relatives care for twins one seems to eat while the other needs diaper change or needs to be tended to in some other way infant is dangerous even leaving them unattended when they re sleeping in their crib at night can be dangerous there is certainly risk in allowing your infant to continue enjoying their feeding while you change his twin brother dirty diaper less than three feet away at changing table and then stopping to take picture of the cuteness of it but we all do riskier things with our children on daily
